name: Happygrep
body:
### Grep made simple and stupid

```
$ cd the_dir_you_want_search
$ happygrep keyword_to_search
```

### Authors and Contributors
@happypeter
@billie66

### Support or Contact
Peter Wang <happypeter1983@gmail.com>
tagline: A Cli front-end of grep, featured with quick file open and edit
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
